description: Search the web using various search engines and APIs.

query.info: The search query or keywords to search for.

api_key.info: API key for the selected search engine service.

search_engine.info: Which search engine API to use for the search.

max_results.info: Maximum number of search results to return (1-100).

search_type.info: Type of search to perform (web, images, news, videos, shopping).

language.info: Language for search results and interface.

country.info: Country/region to focus the search results on.

time_range.info: Restrict search results to a specific time period.

safe_search.info: Enable safe search filtering to exclude adult content.

include_snippets.info: Whether to include text snippets/descriptions in the results.

include_metadata.info: Whether to include additional metadata like domains, dates, cached URLs, etc.

timeout.info: Request timeout in seconds for the search API calls.

text_key.info: The key to use for the text field in the Data objects (e.g., 'title', 'snippet', 'url').

errors.missing_api_key: API key is required for web search.
errors.no_results: No search results found for the given query.
